About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Who Am I?

I am Thomas, a student from the UK who has a passion for Maths, Computer Science and Music. I am results driven, with a desire to always improve and a strong ambition to make a difference in life
I'm currently studying for my A Levels, which I will take in 2022, and then hopefully study at University. Afterwards, I intend to pursue a career within the technology industry. In my free time, I love to program. This can be learning a new programming language, trying to create a game or a website (such as this one). I also enjoy reading books about technology. My favourite book is "SuperIntelligence" by Nick Bostrom, detailing how humanity can use AI to achieve "SuperIntelligence"
Music is also a massive part of my life. In primary school, I was first introduced to the trombone and ever since then, I have annoyed my family with my "interesting" and "unqiue" playing. I enjoy playing in my local and school bands, singing in the school choir as well as practing for my exams. I intend to sit my grade 8 in Trombone in the summer of next year.

Lancaster University Maths Masterclass

Due to my academic performance, I was invited to a Lancaster University Maths Masterclass in 2019.

Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

My Game "Boxtrot" achieved top 15% score in a global competition where participants had a week to create a game from scratch.

Music Awards

I am always improving my Trombone and Singing skills, achieving Distinction at both Grade 7 Trombone and Grade 6 Singing
